title: Red durian could become Malaysia’s next big agro
desc: A Malaysian lawmaker says Borneo’s rare Durian Merah, also known as red durian, could become a major agro-tourism attraction and commercial crop if it is properly developed. - VnExpress International

title: Ruben Amorim labelled 'very embarrassing' as ex-Man Utd boss continues to catch strays amid Kobbie Mainoo's resurgence under Michael Carrick
desc: Former Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim has been told that Kobbie Mainoo's form is 'very embarrassing' for him after failing to get the best out of the England midfielder when he was in charge at Old Trafford. Mainoo made only a handful of appearances this season with Amorim in the dugout, but has started all four of United's wins under new boss Michael Carrick.

title: Lammy reportedly warned Starmer over Mandelson; Union boss calls for PM to go - UK politics live
desc: Deputy PM reportedly warned Starmer not to appoint Mandelson as US ambassador because of his links to Jeffrey Epstein

title: Don’t risk your health on unapproved aphrodisiacs - FDA warns youth
desc: The Food and Drugs Authority (FDA) has issued a warning to consumers against the use of unapproved aphrodisiacs, citing serious health risks associated with many of these products.

title: Base MHIT plan covers controlled pre-existing conditions subject to terms, says Dr Dzul
desc: HULU LANGAT: Persons with pre-existing health conditions will be eligible for the affordable base medical and health insurance/takaful (MHIT) plan, but are subject to certain terms, says Health Minister Datuk Seri Dr Dzulkefly Ahmad.

title: SpaceX resumes Starlink launches days after Falcon 9 anomaly
desc: SpaceX successfully resumed its Falcon 9 flights, launching another batch of Starlink satellites from California's Vandenberg Space Force Base on Saturday, February 7, 2026.
